name: RC Sumo
description:
P1 Controls:WASD basic controls
Q & E for sidestepping mechanic
Spacebar for punching
F for Throttle boost, Hold down for increased power

P2 Controls: 
Arrowkeys for basic controls
Right Shift & NUMPAD 1 for sidestepping mechanic
Dash ( - ) for punching
period ( . ) for throttle boost
